definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

pinyin: zhi2 wu4 hua4 xue2 cheng2 fen4

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical composition of volatile oil from the leaves of Glycyrrhiza Inflata Batal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析脹果甘草葉的揮發性化學成分。

sentences.english: These rocks have similar petrochemical compositions, mineral constituents and rock-forming tectonic settings.
sentences.chinese: 這些岩石有相近的岩石化學成分和成巖構造環境。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical composition of Belamcanda chinensis in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究山東產射干的化學成分。

sentences.english: Quenching degree is mainly determined by chemical composition and organization structure of steel.
sentences.chinese: 淬透性主要取決於鋼的化學成分和鋼的組織結構。

sentences.english: The research aimed to analyze the components and antibacterial activities of essential oils from Salvia plebeia R.
sentences.chinese: 分析荔枝草揮發油化學成分並對其抑菌活性進行研究。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the chemical constituents in Kalimeris indica(L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究苗藥馬蘭的化學成分。

sentences.english: This is a view on the chemical composition and Pharmacological Function of Colla Corii Asini.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了中藥阿膠的化學成分及其藥理藥效作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the constituents in the herbal of Oxytropis falcata.
sentences.chinese: 目的對藏藥鐮形棘豆的化學成分進行研究。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the chemical constituents of the rhizomes of Anemarrhena asphodeloides Bunge.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究知母根莖的化學成分。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the chemical components of the essential oil of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討江西婺源產山蠟梅葉揮發油的化學成分。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the main chemical composition of Furong plums in Yongtai, Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定福建永泰芙蓉李中主要化學成分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of Sedum aixoon L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究景天三七全草的化學成分。

sentences.english: Chemical constituents and their pharmacological research progress in medicinal plants of Glechoma Linn.
sentences.chinese: 活血丹屬植物的化學成分及藥理研究進展。

sentences.english: Aim To study the chemical constituents of Artemisia anomala S.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究南劉寄奴的化學成分。

sentences.english: Geniposide and crocin are two major chemical components of Gardenia jasminoides Eillis.
sentences.chinese: 素是梔子中的兩種主要化學成分。

sentences.english: Objective To review the studies on the chemical constituents and biological activities of the fruits of Cnidium monnieri.
sentences.chinese: 目的對中藥蛇牀子的化學成分和生物活性作一綜述。
